name: WPWidescreen Fix
description: Widescreen (and old-style font for main body) fix for Whirlpool Broadband Forums
additional_info:
What it does do:

* Remove the brown borders on the sides for screens at low-ish resolutions (hence the name and original purpose)
* Change the main post font to 13px Verdana (old style)
* Change the smiley faces to use a font that doesn't suck
* Move the 'Quote this selection' button to the right sidebar on resolutions > 1000px

What it doesn't do:
Change much of anything else. (No, it doesn't change the heading fonts. No it doesn't change the colour scheme).
